Get a price estimation quote

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
></Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[
    {
      in: "query",
      name: "amount_in",
      description: "The amount of tokens to sell in decimal notation",
      schema: {
        description: "Amount of an ERC20 token as a decimal string (no scientific notation)",
        type: "string",
        pattern: "^[0-9]+$",
        example: "1000000000000000000",
        title: "TokenAmount",
      },
      required: true,
      example: "1000000000000000000",
    },
    {
      in: "query",
      name: "token_in",
      description: "The token address to sell",
      schema: {
        description: "20 byte Ethereum address encoded as a hex with `0x` prefix",
        type: "string",
        pattern: "^0x[a-fA-F0-9]{40}$",
        example: "0x6B175474E89094C44Da98b954EedeAC495271d0F",
        title: "Address",
      },
      required: true,
      example: "0x6B175474E89094C44Da98b954EedeAC495271d0F",
    },
    {
      in: "query",
      name: "token_out",
      description: "The token address to buy",
      schema: {
        description: "20 byte Ethereum address encoded as a hex with `0x` prefix",
        type: "string",
        pattern: "^0x[a-fA-F0-9]{40}$",
        example: "0x6B175474E89094C44Da98b954EedeAC495271d0F",
        title: "Address",
      },
      required: true,
      example: "0xC02aaA39b223FE8D0A0e5C4F27eAD9083C756Cc2",
    },
  ]}
></ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema title={"Body"} body={undefined}></RequestSchema>
